description: Electronic Arts Spore is a real-time strategy game in which players evolve creatures from microscopic organisms to intelligent, spacefaring beings. The game uses many SPUI images to skin its various menus, toolbars, buttons, frames, and other UI elements.
While most players will never encounter Spore's SPUI files, Spore modders frequently extract and modify the game's SPUI files to create customized UI elements.
